#define PUT_32BIT_LE (   cp,
  value 
)
Value:
do {                                    \
        (cp)[3] = (value) >> 24;                                        \
        (cp)[2] = (value) >> 16;                                        \
        (cp)[1] = (value) >> 8;                                         \
        (cp)[0] = (value); } while (0)

  value 
)
Value:
do {                                    \
        (cp)[7] = (value) >> 56;                                        \
        (cp)[6] = (value) >> 48;                                        \
        (cp)[5] = (value) >> 40;                                        \
        (cp)[4] = (value) >> 32;                                        \
        (cp)[3] = (value) >> 24;                                        \
        (cp)[2] = (value) >> 16;                                        \
        (cp)[1] = (value) >> 8;                                         \
        (cp)[0] = (value); } while (0)

void MD5Transform ( u_int32_t  state[4],
const u_int8_t  block[MD5_BLOCK_LENGTH] 
)

The core of the MD5 algorithm, this alters an existing MD5 hash to reflect the addition of 16 longwords of new data.

MD5Update blocks the data and converts bytes into longwords for this routine.
